title: Walmart SDE III (IN4)  vs ServiceNow (IC2) || Career Dilema
content:
Guys, I need advice here. I am able to grab these two offers as of now:-

Prev Org - FinTech Company
Prev Comp - 20 LPA
Prev Location: WFH
YOE - 3 years

Company: Walmart **(Still need to get the exact numbers)**
Title/Level: Software Engineer III (IN4)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 23 - 25 LPA
Bonus: 20% = 5 L
Stock bonus: 13 LPA/ 3 yrs **(Still Unconfirmed as generally Walmart gives 25% of base as stock)**
Joining Bonus: 2 L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock) for 1st yr: 34.33 LPA + 2 L Joining Bonus for 1st yr 
Benefits: Relocation + General Walmart Benefits

Company: ServiceNow 
Title/Level: Software Engineer IC2
Location: Hydrabad
Salary: 25 LPA
Bonus: 10% = 2.5 L
Stock bonus: $50K / 4 yrs
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock) for 1st yr: ~ 38 LPA 
Benefits: Relocation + General ServiceNow Benefits

**Note:** 
1. Walmart's salary is still uncorfirmed (HR saying 23-25 L as Base) 
2. How is Walmart IDC (India Development Center)?
3. How is ServiceNow Hyderabad?
3. Which company will be best to join?

My priorities are **WLB, Growth >= Compensation >= Location**
Please help me make a decision. What to do?
company: Walmart (still Need To Get The Exact Numbers)
salaryTotal: For 1st Yr: 34.33 Lpa + 2 L Joining Bonus For 1st Yr

title: Accenture | ASE | PAN India
content:
Education: BTech 2024 batch (Information Technology)
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Freelance Web Designing in Second Year | No Internships
Date of the Offer: Oct 2023
Company: Accenture 
Title/Level: Pacakaged App Development Associate (Associate Software Engineer)
Location: PAN India
Salary: Rs 3.83 LPA
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: Rs. 35 k
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 10% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~4.5 LPA 
Benefits: Cab Facility + Medical Insurance 
Other details: NA

(It ain't much but it's honest work)
Not allowed to sit for further on campus placements so now offcampus it is (tough nut to crack ik)
role: Pacakaged App Development Associate (associate Software Engineer)
